subject: Re: [sugar] Posting an activity bundle
body:
Is there a general activity repository - other than the wiki?

On 5/14/07, Marco Pesenti Gritti  wrote:
> Jonathan Blocksom wrote:
> > I have a sample activity bundle I'd like to put up on the wiki.  I had
> > created a .tgz of the bundle and the wiki gave me a warning at the
> > upload screen about the .tgz extension not being valid for an image
> > (even when I clicked the "ignore warnings" button).
> >
> > What's the procedure for uploading an activity bundle?  Is .tgz the
> > preferred format, or is there another extension?  I couldn't see
> > anything on the wiki about this.
> >
> >
> Activity bundles should be packaged as zip files with the ".xo"
> extension. I added this on the wiki bundles page too.
>
> Marco
